title: AllPaths Categorized Paths
description: Stage 4 output: Paths with categorization (new/modified/unchanged) and validation metadata

paths.description: Array of paths with categorization and validation metadata

id.description: Unique hash identifier for this path

route.description: Ordered list of passage names in this path

content.description: Mapping of passage names to their text content

git_metadata.description: Git version control metadata for this path

files.description: Source files containing passages in this path

commit_date.description: ISO 8601 timestamp of most recent commit affecting this path

created_date.description: ISO 8601 timestamp when first passage in path was created

passage_to_file.description: Mapping of passage names to source file paths

category.description: Path category based on two-level test (path existence + content changes)

validated.description: Whether this path has been validated by a human reviewer

first_seen.description: ISO 8601 timestamp when this path was first detected

new.description: Count of new paths (not in base branch, with novel prose)

modified.description: Count of modified paths (existed in base with changes, or new path without novel prose)

unchanged.description: Count of unchanged paths (existed in base with no changes)
